Figure 1:Experimental framework for analyzing personas as behavioral priors in clinical LLMs.
Personas are injected via system prompts (A). Models are evaluated on two clinical tasks, yielding decision labels, free-text justifications, and latent logit scores (B). Behavioral effects are quantified using automated metrics and assessed qualitatively through blinded LLM-based rankings, with validation by expert clinicians (C).
